name: S.O. Creative
description:
S.O. Creative was founded by Sherri Oldham, a veteran of over twenty-five years in the southwest advertising scene and winner of numerous national, regional and local awards.
Our experience extends across the communications spectrum with clients from the transportation, technology, lifestyle, health, community, and fashion sectors.
We offer big agency thinking with a distinctly in-house approach. Working closely with our clients, we discover corporate and customer values then translate our findings into meaningful action, recognizable experiences and customer-aligned marketing efforts that drive business.
